title: The Moth Radio Hour: Wedding Dress, Prison Choir, and Hot Dogs
description:
A feminist searches for the perfect wedding dress, a playwright visits a prison in Malawi, a man spends a lifetime regretting a single moment, and a new mother struggles with her prosthetic arm. Hosted by The Moth's Senior Producer, Jenifer Hixson. The Moth Radio Hour is produced by The Moth and Jay Allison of Atlantic Public Media.

Storytellers: Jessi Klein, Al Letson, Marco Huertas, Mary Archbold
itunes:subtitle: Stories from a dance audition, a hot dog stand, a bridal shop, and prison.
itunes:author: The Moth
